summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey Epstein for shipping services rendered. It details the charges, discounts, and payment information related to a shipment made on April 21, 2004. The total amount due is $72.66, with a payment deadline of May 18, 2004.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the individual to whom the invoice is addressed, indicating he is the account holder for the FedEx services.

events.title: FedEx Shipment
events.description: A shipment was picked up by FedEx from Jeffrey Epstein's address.

locations: 457 Madison Ave FL 4, New York, NY 10022-6843
keyFacts: The invoice is dated May 3, 2004, and pertains to shipping services provided to Jeffrey Epstein.
The total charges for the shipment amount to $72.66, with a payment due date of May 18, 2004.
The shipment was picked up on April 21, 2004.
The invoice includes a discount of $2.13 applied to the total charges.
The document contains multiple references to FedEx services and billing details.
